version_description:
- Now you can create folders
- Bug fixes
- Stability and performance improvement

- Added pointer
- Added messaging
- Stability and performance improvement

- Bug fixes
- Stability and performance improvements

1.Enable/Disable control for all participants
2.Bug fixing
3.Stability and performance improvements
Added multipage boards export
Added forgot password functionality

1.Added Shapes and Texts selection and move
2.Bug fixes and performance improvements
Added multipage boards export

This major release includes many long-awaited features.
1. Group your contacts to create classrooms or teams and easily start new collaborative sessions with the entire group.
2. Cross-device Sync feature will allow accessing all your drawings from any device using your account.
3. Enable audio conference by subscribing to our Premium plan. You can use a 30-day FREE trial without providing any credit card.

This major release includes many long-awaited features.
1. Group your contacts to create classrooms or teams and easily start new collaborative sessions with the entire group.
2. Cross-device Sync feature will allow accessing all your drawings from any device using your account.
3. Enable audio conference by subscribing to our Premium plan. You can use a 30-day FREE trial without providing any credit card.

1. Added pointer tool for shared sessions
2. Bug fixes and stability improvements

1. Fix audio conference issues.
2. Fix line action trimming.
3. Add delete functionality for ended sessions.
4. Bug fixes and stability improvements

1. Fix audio conference issues.
2. Fix line action trimming.
3. Add delete functionality for ended sessions.
4. Bug fixes and stability improvements

1. Fix audio conference issues.
2. Fix line action trimming.
3. Add delete functionality for ended sessions.
4. Bug fixes and stability improvements.

1. Added zooming support
2. Improved stability and bug fixes

1. Added zooming support
2. Improved stability and bug fixes

Introducing the new board design!
Also now you can record your drawing without tools and buttons.
Since now the images in board can be moved and deleted.
Added account delete functionality.
Also this version includes bug fixes and stability improvements.

Introducing LiveBoard’s new design!
Additionally you can record your drawing without without capturing tool icons and buttons.
The images in the board now can be moved and deleted and you can change the board’s gridline too.
This version also includes bug fixes and stability improvements.

Added disable chat functionality for the host of the session.
Also, you can now generate and share with others the public link to join the session easier.
This release also contains several bug fixes and performance improvements.
We are continuously improving the application, if you still see any issues please let us know

Now joined users can answer or reject calls during live sessions.
Additionally, the call participants will see the call indicator in the status bar.
This release also contains several bug fixes and performance improvements.
We are continuously improving the application, if you still see any issues please let us know.
